title: Taunton - Mastering Your Bandsaw
description:
AN Expert Helps You Get Optimum Performance from Your Bandsaw 
Mark Duginske shows you how to precisely tune and accurately use your bandsaw to achieve optimum performance. In this download you'll also see how to:

- Change blades effortlessly
- Re-saw boards from firewood
- Cut your own veneer
- Build a circle jig
- Cut perfect cones

Mark Duginske, author of the books Mastering Woodworking Machines and The Bandsaw Handbook, is a professional woodworker and has developed a variety of successful power tool accessories.

Every classic Fine Woodworking video takes you right into an expert woodworker's shop. You'll see firsthand exactly how to do the work-the tools, the techniques, and the subtle rhythms of each process. Now reissued in a downloadable format, this timeless information is even more accessible.
